org.albertschmitt.crypto.common

Class Hex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.albertschmitt.crypto.common.Hex

  • public final class Hex
extends java.lang.Object
    Convert byte arrays to hexadecimal strings and visa-versa. This class is useful in situations where you want to store byte data in a text file.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] decode(java.lang.String hexString)
      Convert a hexadecimal string back into a byte array.
      static java.lang.String encode(byte[] data)
      Convert a byte array into a hexadecimal string.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • decode

        public static byte[] decode(java.lang.String hexString)
        Convert a hexadecimal string back into a byte array. This function reverses the action of the #encode(byte data[]) function.
        Parameters:
        hexString - A hexadecimal string.
        Returns:
        a byte array representation of the hexadecimal string.

      • encode

        public static java.lang.String encode(byte[] data)
        Convert a byte array into a hexadecimal string.
        Parameters:
        data - The byte array to be converted into a hexadecimal string.
        Returns:
        A hexadecimal string representation of the byte data.
